item.title: KPMG data analytics virtual internship experience sharing
item.description: Last week, I participated in KPMG data analytics virtual internship program and I’d like to share my experience in this blog. Firstly, KPMG data analytics virtual internship is a free online internship program offer data analytics trainning to students or professions who want to develop related skills. The virtual internship actually is a task 1: draft an email which report the data quality issue and related strategy. total seven dimenstions need to be considered accuracy,completeness, consistency, currency, relevancy, validity, uniqueness.
